name: European Snacks Association
membership: Members of FoodDrinkEurope and the International Treenut Council (INC)
goal:
The European Snacks Association is Europe’s only trade organisation dedicated to the advancement of the savoury snacks industry on behalf of its members.
ESA members are international snack producers and industry suppliers, who together are involved in the manufacture of potato crisps, corn chips / tortillas, pellet snacks, baked snacks, crackers, pretzels, savoury biscuits, popcorn, meat snacks, fruit snacks, peanuts, other snack nuts and various other savoury snacks in this category.
ESA represents member companies’ interests at European and International levels and is proactive in the anticipation and fielding of potential issues of relevance to the industry.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: All issues in the areas of food, nutrition, health, food safety, environment, and competition relevant for the savoury snacks industry
